title: LendAction
description:
The act of providing an object under an agreement that it will be returned at a later date. Reciprocal of BorrowAction.

Related actions:


BorrowAction: Reciprocal of LendAction.

allOf.description: The act of transferring/moving (abstract or concrete) animate or inanimate objects from one place to another.

borrower.description: A sub property of participant. The person that borrows the object being lent.
